name: Cutie Booty Blasters
description:
INTRODUCTION

In CutieBootyBlasters your butt is your only weakness. Keep your booty safe by running away from your friends or standing still. Moving though will reveal your lovely bottom, and if anybody spots that round beauty you better make sure they can't get their hands on it.

This was a small project I worked on for a month, there's a lot I would love to do with it, and if you'd like to see more please let me know! 

IMPORTANT BITS

This game DOES requires that you have a Xbox controller to play. Sorry if you have other controllers! 

If you launch the game and you don't have a character on screen, restart the game and make sure you have a Xbox controller connected to your PC.

CREDITS

Art Assets: https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-game-assets-2

Music: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/
